text: [Music]
some people have asked us probably after
a shorter night's sleep than they
expected
why do you stirs crow roosters crow
because they're jerks and they want
everyone to know that hey I'm a rooster
this is my coop these are my hens that
I'm gonna have sex with go away so now
if you're asking why do roosters crow at
dawn the answer is simply that most
birds make noise at dawn daybreak is
when birds are most active unlike most
teenagers you know they have a circadian
rhythm that kicks into high gear as soon
as it's light outside and once they've
perked up they start making noise
mostly territorial calls that let
everyone know where their turf is and
the reason roosters are associated with
crowing at dawn is probably mostly
because roosters are just really loud
the power of roosters call can depend on
the breed but some crows have been
measured at 80 to 90 decibels about as
loud as a lawn mower or a really big
barking dog and that's twice as loud as
the usual chorus of early morning birds
that you'd otherwise hear so if you've
ever lived near roosters you probably
just didn't notice other birds making
their morning territorial calls because
there's so much quieter like with most
animals you can disrupt a Roosters
circadian rhythm by keeping it in a dark
room for a couple of days if you were in
a dark room for a couple of days with no
way of telling when it was day or night
you'd probably start keeping weird hours
- but roosters can also crow at other
times of the day and all night pretty
much whenever they want actually if they
hear a loud noise and they think the
noise is here to have sex with their
hands they'll crow if they see a bright
light and it startles them they'll crow
if another rooster starts crowing nearby
they'll crow there isn't really any way
to shut them up
but at least now you know and thanks for
asking especially to all of our
subscribers on subbable if you have a
quick question you'd like us to answer
let us know you can find us on Facebook
and Twitter and as always in the
comments below and if you want to keep
